files.README.md:
# Punt Labs Claude Code Plugins

Plugin marketplace for [Punt Labs](https://github.com/punt-labs) projects.

## Setup

```bash
/plugin marketplace add punt-labs/claude-plugins
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Source | Description |
|--------|--------|-------------|
| `punt` | [punt-kit](https://github.com/punt-labs/punt-kit) | Standards enforcement and reconciliation |

## Install a Plugin

```bash
/plugin install punt@punt-labs
```

plugins.name: punt
plugins.description: Punt Labs standards enforcement — LLM-powered reconciliation of workflows, configs, and project structure

plugins.name: dungeon
plugins.description: A text adventure game engine for Claude Code — play scripted dungeon crawls powered by Claude as game master
